robo-team.title: UPRM Roboboat Team
robo-team.description: A student team that designs, manufactures and programs an autonomous boat and drone. The purpose of this team is to encourage female participation by having 50% female members.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: roboboat.uprm@gmail.com
• Facebook: UPRM Roboboat Team
• Instagram: roboboat.uprm

solar-eng.title: The Solar Engineering Research and Racing Team
solar-eng.description: The Solar Engineering Research and Racing Team (SERRT) is one of the flagship engineering projects of the University of Puerto Rico at Mayaguez. This team currently develops a solar powered car to compete in the American Solar Challenge and Formula Sun Grand Prix.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: serrt.uprm@gmail.com
• Facebook: Serrt.Uprm
• Instagram: serrtuprm

alpha-astrum.title: Alpha Astrum
alpha-astrum.description: Alpha Astrum is a non-profit student association at UPRM focused in providing students with valuable hands-on experience on the field of rocketry and aerospace, as well as, to expand the aerospace industry and develop sustainable spaceflight capabilities in Puerto Rico.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: alphaastrum@gmail.com
• Facebook: facebook.com/alphaastrum2018/
• Instagram: instagram.com/alphaastrum/

cre.title: Colegio Racing Engineering
cre.description: The main objective of the project is to promote and strengthen the passion for engineering and project management, among other areas, through the application of the concepts learned in university courses.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: fsae14@uprm.edu
• Facebook: Colegio Racing Engineering - FSAE UPRM
• Instagram: fsae_uprm

nasca.title: NASA RASC-AL
nasca.description: The NASA RASC-AL team from SEDS-UPRM designs and analyses advanced human and robotic space exploration missions that solve the greatest challenges in this field.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: wilbert.ruperto@upr.edu
• Facebook: facebook.com/SEDS-UPRM
• Instagram: instagram.com/seds_uprm

vanguard.title: Project Vanguard
vanguard.description: An undergraduate research and development team dedicated in creating UAV solutions for the betterment of Puerto Rico.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: uav@uprm.edu
• Facebook: projectvanguardpr
• Instagram: projectvanguardpr

rum-air.title: RUM-Air
rum-air.description: RUM-Air is a multidisciplinary remote-controlled aircraft design team from the Society of Automotive Engineers (SAE) Collegiate chapter from the University of Puerto Rico, Mayagüez Campus (UPRM).

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: aerodesign.uprm@gmail.com
• Facebook: www.facebook.com/AeroDesignUPRM
• Instagram: aero_rum

rumarino.title: RUMarino
rumarino.description: RUMarino is a multidisciplinary team that develops and programs its own autonomous underwater vehicle (AUV).

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: rumarino.uprm@gmail.com
• Facebook: RUMarino
• Instagram: rumarino_proteus

seds-uprm.title: Student for the Exploration and Development of Space
seds-uprm.description: Student for the Exploration and Development of Space, Mayagüez Chapter, or (SEDS-UPRM) is an interdisciplinary student organization focused on space sciences, engineering, and exploration.

fields.name: Contact Info & Social Media
fields.value:
• Email: seds.uprm@uprm.edu
• Facebook: facebook.com/seds.uprm
• Instagram: instagram.com/seds.upr
